DOC.brief_summary: The investigators evaluate if intravenously applied THC (Cannabis) reduces postoperative Nausea and vomiting. THC will be given during anesthesia before emergence. We measure how long and how effective it reduces PONV
DOC.brief_title: Does Intravenous Cannabis Reduce Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting (PONV)?
DOC.criteria: ASA IIII elective open and laparoscopic surgery >1hour ambulatory surgery pregnancy, breast feeding >ASA III BMI >35 antipsychotic, antiemetic, cytostatic therapy major cardiovascular, renal, hepatic, central nervous system disease current chronic cannabis consumption and hard drug abuse schizophrenia preoperative nausea and vomiting, vestibular disease not speaking german or french refusal to participate
